#summary This page provides an overview to the PHP RIA SDK by Adobe.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

Getting started with the PHP RIA SDK by Adobe is easy.  Simply [http://www.adobe.com/devnet/flex/articles/flex_php_sdk.html download the SDK], extract it, then open up the index.html page.

= Details =

There are a few things you need to keep in mind:

  * Access the SDK through your webserver, ie. http://localhost/php_ria_sdk_by_adobe/
  * Email the Google Group at http://groups.google.com/group/adobe_php_sdk/ with issues.
